otherNames: Galactic Drifter Vifam: 12 Fade Away, Round Vernian Vifam: 12 Fade Away, 銀河漂流バイファム 消えた12人
synopsis: This episode is a sidestory and can be inserted somewhere between episodes #18 and #21. This is a "mystery" and so the present writer does not tell the whole story. The Janus is sailing towards Taut when something unexpected happens.
